title: Bug 50591NPE in ReplicationValve in 7.0.6
description: Bug 50591NPE in ReplicationValve in 7.0.6 It was reported on the users@ list:http://tomcat.markmail.org/thread/44rnbj7gbkevzb32SEVERE: Unable to perform replication request.java.lang.NullPointerExceptionat org.apache.catalina.ha.tcp.ReplicationValve.isRequestWithoutSessionChange(ReplicationValve.java:554)It will occur when ReplicationValvefilter attribute has an empty value.
